value:
$WmMPID_グスタフ,ch00_13_Gustaf_M_Normal,Face_Anger|Son.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|Father... It has been some time since
we have spoken. I am honored to be
invited to this audience.$k$p$WmMPID_グスタフ,ch00_13_Gustaf_M_Normal,Face_Anger|And?$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|Er...$k$p$WmMPID_ヘンリエッテ,ch00_14_Henriette_F_Normal,Face|Oh, Alfonse! Don't be nervous.$k$pHe's missed you so much! It's been
far too long.$k$p$WmMPID_グスタフ,ch00_13_Gustaf_M_Normal,Face_Anger|Henriette... Please, be discreet.$k$p$WmMPID_ヘンリエッテ,ch00_14_Henriette_F_Normal,Face|My mistake!$k$p$WmMPID_グスタフ,ch00_13_Gustaf_M_Normal,Face_Anger|Alfonse, my son. I'm sure your
mother has filled you in.$k$pAskr has been invaded.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|Yes. She said that the soldiers are
from Hel, the realm of the dead.$k$pI know little of it.$k$p$WmMPID_グスタフ,ch00_13_Gustaf_M_Normal,Face_Anger|To the west lies a desolate tomb... It
is a gate to the realm of the dead.$k$pTwenty years ago now, I commanded
a barrier be erected to seal it in.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|And so?$k$p$WmMPID_グスタフ,ch00_13_Gustaf_M_Normal,Face_Anger|As you well know, we Askrans cannot
close gates—only open them.$k$pAll I could do to close off Hel was
encircle the tomb with our strongest
barrier...$k$pFor 20 years, it has held them off.
None have made it past.$k$pBut now...that defense has fallen.$k$pThe army of the dead has surged into
Askr...$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|How terrible...$k$p$WmMPID_グスタフ,ch00_13_Gustaf_M_Normal,Face_Anger|We must stop them. No injury can
befall our people.$k$pDo you understand, my son?$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|Yes, Father. I will not fail you.$k$p

$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|We must lead the charge to the tomb.
Let's go, $Nu!$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face|Our scouts have already reached the
gate. Our role is to gather information
for the king's knights who will follow.$k$p$EFace_Cool|This is of the utmost importance.
Come on!$k$p$Sbs1000|

$WmMPID_神階エイル,ch00_20_Eir_F_Normal,Face|Know this, $Nu...$k$pI will devote myself to you. No
matter what order you give me, I
will obey it.$k$p

$WmMPID_ロキ,ch00_08_Loki_F_Normal,Face|The realm of the dead. What a
perfect little mess! Wouldn't you say
so, dear?$k$p$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Normal,Face_Anger|You betrayed me, and yet here you
stand, without a trace of fear...$k$p$WmMPID_ロキ,ch00_08_Loki_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Oh my, my, my. I helped you in the
end, dear, didn't I? What a vicious
look you have on your face!$k$pPlease forgive me! Or kill me.$k$p$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Normal,Face|I would if I could.$k$pBut lopping your head off wouldn't
accomplish anything at all, would it?$k$p$WmMPID_ロキ,ch00_08_Loki_F_Normal,Face|You do fuss so, Veronica. But rather
than worry about my head, what of
the locations of...other things?$k$pYour brother, the prince, still hasn't
returned from his little quest...$k$pAnd what do you plan to do when
Hel turns toward you, and Embla?$k$p$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Normal,Face|If Hel destroys Askr, that is all to the
good.$k$p$EFace_Anger|But Embla must not be touched by
this conflict.$k$p$WmMPID_ロキ,ch00_08_Loki_F_Normal,Face|The dead are enemies to all the living.
It's only a matter of time, sweet girl.$k$pHel makes an unrelenting foe. Alone,
Askr stands no chance.$k$p$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Normal,Face|Loki... This is your doing?$k$p$WmMPID_ロキ,ch00_08_Loki_F_Normal,Face|My dear! You wound me! To suggest
that I'd be responsible for this... After
all we've been through?$k$p$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Normal,Face|Hmm...$k$p$Sbs150|
